csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale>
    <terms>
      <term name="open-quote">‘</term>
      <term name="close-quote">’</term>
      <term name="open-inner-quote">“</term>
      <term name="close-inner-quote">”</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="
">
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <choose>
          <if is-numeric="edition">
            <number variable="edition" prefix="[" suffix="]"/>
            <label variable="edition"/>
          </if>
          <else>
            <number variable="edition"/>
          </else>
	    </choose>
        <text variable="edition" prefix="--- " quotes="true"/>
        <text variable="title" prefix="--- "/>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>

input.title: parsed for affixes, numeric (I think), plural
Enclosing quotes stripped, trailing label stripped, numeric, singular
Enclosing quotes stripped, trailing label stripped, numeric, plural
Non-numeric (label must be spelled out in full)
